alert.note: Alert for Greene; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 2:01AM EDT until April 08 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek At Prattsville. * WHEN...From this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor flood stage. The river overflows into lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 12.2 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage before noon time. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.2 feet on 11/28/1993. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Prattsville Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Fri 1 am: 11.1 Forecast: Fri 2 am 11.2 Fri 8 am 12.2 Fri 2 pm 8.2 Fri 8 pm 7.8 Sat 2 am 7.1 Sat 8 am 6.3 Sat 2 pm 6.1 Sat 8 pm 6.0 Sun 2 am 5.8 Sun 8 am 5.5 Sun 2 pm 5.4 Sun 8 pm 5.2 &&
